archiefmat.titel: Colonial Office and predecessors: General Draft Letters Patent, Commissions, Royal Instructions, Warrants, etc.
archiefmat.titel_eng: Colonial Office and predecessors: General draft letters patent, commissions, royal instructions, warrants, etc.
archiefmat.scope: This series contains Colonial Office draft letters patent, commissions, royal instructions, warrants, etc. and includes Board of Trade records for the earlier period.
